title: Grott
creator_credit: Neil Robinson and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: An auto-aesthetic analysis of the conceptual indeterminacy of the slides-of-our-holiday genre, probing the Milesian paranomasia inherent in the aetiology of the medium, specifically, (a)where are we going? (b)what does it all mean? (c)who are all these people?
